subject: Boxing
Child Abuse and Neglect
Domestic Violence
Gambling
lead_paragraph: Mayweather Jr., who on Saturday will meet Manny Pacquiao in a money swamp of a championship welterweight bout, has a long and documented history of employing brutality beyond the boxing ring.
snippet: Mayweather Jr., who on Saturday will meet Manny Pacquiao in a money swamp of a championship welterweight bout, has a long and documented history of employing brutality beyond the boxing ring.
